The archive file for a system contains all the values of measures resulting from evaluating selected metrics. It also contains the definitions of non elementary metrics (the one user has
/tools/eiffelstudio/how_to_s/70_analyzing_a_project/20_handling_new_metrics/10_defining_new_metrics/00_introduction.xml defined ) in order to be sure of what is being measured.
The archive files are entitled to achieve comparisons between systems. And then, user can compare systems to evaluate their own projects.
